version_description:
Summer time! This update brings repeating to-do to a finer level:
• Repeating to-do’s accuracy is improved, and is updated everyday after 3am for late sleepers :]
• Repeating to-do notifications now display their content like regular to-dos
• Today widget’s interaction with repeating to-do is fixed
• Empty to-do items can be removed by backspacing :)
• Calendar events in timeline become clearer to see the dates
• Calendar event recognition is enhanced when combining English & Chinese
• A loading indicator or note count now shows at the bottom of timeline
• Forgotten passcode now can be reset after 3 days

Let's go surfing :)))

Let's go surfing :)))

Pendo is now on Mac! Check it out in Mac App Store :D

Pendo 3.7 is ready for iPhone X and FaceID! We can’t wait to bring you:
• iOS 11 photo drag & drop support - drag photos in anywhere anytime :)
• Long press images to move them - no more mistakes
• VASTLY improved syncing efficiency and timeline smoothness
• Reduced data storage size by up to 50%
• A handful of new themes - it’s just the beginning ;)
• You said that to-do’s “meow” is too quiet, so we made it louder & added 2 new sounds!
• To-do becomes smarter - if you paste a list into another list they’ll merge together
• Enhanced memory efficiency for long note with multiple photos
• Updated 3D touch on app icon with with more useful options

Wish you enjoy the beautiful fall season & explore some new adventures!

• Updated 3D touch on app icon with with more useful options

Wish you enjoy the beautiful fall season & explore some new adventures!

Pendo 3.7.1 fixed sharing to FB & Twitter, improved repeating to-do & title style, and enhanced stability.

Winter holidays are coming! Pendo is bringing you:
~ Overhauled repeating to-do which is simpler, more responsive & reliable
~ To-do & Calendar events now show day countdown :D
~ Sharing ability to any apps accepting text & images
~ Snapshot command to save or share note as an image
~ Removed not-so-useful “Shared” tab in timeline to make it cleaner ;)
~ Better optimization for iPhone X, WeChat share, faster launch time, and more robust

Snowball & Snowboarding time soon!!

Winter holidays are coming! Pendo is bringing you:
~ Winter icon :D
~ Toggle whether to update note's date upon editing
~ Email backup now includes title
~ Fixed a crash when syncing with some calendar events without title
~ More smooth timeline & editing view

Happy Spring Festival! 3.9 brings:
Way smarter search ability - try typing “Today”, “Friday” and other date specific terms (:
When in search or delete mode, tapping anywhere else now exits the mode to make actions more clear
When selecting photos, long press to preview in full screen
If mail is not setup when doing backup, backup content will be copied to pasteboard
Fixed an issue where font picker sometimes has messed up content

Happy Spring Festival! 3.9 brings:
Way smarter search ability - try typing “Today”, “Friday” and other date specific terms (:
When in search or delete mode, tapping anywhere else now exits the mode to make actions more clear
When selecting photos, long press to preview in full screen
If mail is not setup when doing backup, backup content will be copied to pasteboard
Fixed an issue where font picker sometimes has messed up content

Summer is here! This update fixed layout issues with emojis, made picture dragging more reliable, removed address underlines when snapshotting, and improved Calendar IQ.

5.2 is bringing to you:

• Overhauled syncing system which is much more accurate & efficient!
• More accurate location & more reliable weather info for new journals
• Ability to update existing journals' locations - you can even write up your own fairy place :)
• Letter count for journals, to help you better feel your writing flow ;)
• Way better results when cut, paste, delete & undo with pictures
• Fixed Calendar accounts sometimes get overridden issue, and better support for multi-day events
• Enhanced layouts in calendar view & timeline
• Improved notes searching speed
• Lots of subtle enhancements for to-dos

Enjoy Summer Time!

This update added option to change Timeline font size, made date display more clear, fixed repeating calendar events & events with tags, improved syncing mechanism, and removed swipe-right-to-return gesture when editing a note to reduce mistakes (swiping from the edge still works)

Happy Spring Festival! 3.9.1 aims to fix an issue where to-dos in widget don’t update, and provides more options for to-do reminder time & calendar syncing.

3.9 brings:
Way smarter search ability - try typing “Today”, “Last Friday” and other date specific terms (:
When in search or delete mode, tapping anywhere else now exits the mode to make actions more clear
When selecting photos, long press to preview in full screen
If mail is not setup when doing backup, backup content will be copied to pasteboard
Fixed an issue where font picker sometimes has messed up content

3.9 brings:
Way smarter search ability - try typing “Today”, “Last Friday” and other date specific terms (:
When in search or delete mode, tapping anywhere else now exits the mode to make actions more clear
When selecting photos, long press to preview in full screen
If mail is not setup when doing backup, backup content will be copied to pasteboard
Fixed an issue where font picker sometimes has messed up content

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed calendar view, evolutionized to-do interaction and countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed calendar view - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the experience of planning, summarizing and browsing.

• More flexible to-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item by tapping enter from that item; unchecked & checked items now have a gap to clearly distinguish them ;)

• Today Widget now shows the to-do list with the closest reminder time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having text & pictures together.

• Improved to-do reminder accuracy, fixed jumping checkbox while typing, corrected to-do line number display in timeline.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

Enjoy the 4!!

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed calendar view, evolutionized to-do interaction, beautifully enhanced journal layout & countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed calendar view - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the Pendo experience of planning, summarizing and browsing.

• More flexible to-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item by tapping "return" from that item; unchecked & checked items now have a gap in between to be clearly distinguished ;)

• Today Widget now shows the to-do list with the closest reminder time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having text & pictures together.

• Improved to-do reminder accuracy, fixed jumping checkbox while typing, corrected to-do line number display in timeline.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

4.0.1 improved long text with photos experience, fixes repeating to-do not updating issue and some crashing problems.

4.0.2 fixed a storage bug with iPhone X that causes crashes when adding lots of photos at once, and improved photo storage stability.

Enjoy the 4!!

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed calendar view, evolutionized to-do interaction, beautifully enhanced journal layout & countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed calendar view - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the Pendo experience of planning, summarizing and browsing.

• More flexible to-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item by tapping "return" from that item; unchecked & checked items now have a gap in between to be clearly distinguished ;)

• Today Widget now shows the to-do list with the closest reminder time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having text & pictures together.

• Improved to-do reminder accuracy, fixed jumping checkbox while typing, corrected to-do line number display in timeline.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

4.0.1 improved long text with photos experience, fixes repeating to-do not updating issue and some crashing problems.

4.0.2 fixed a storage bug with iPhone X that causes crashes when adding lots of photos at once, and improved photo storage stability.

Enjoy the 4!!

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed Calendar View, evolutionized To-do interaction, beautifully enhanced Journal layout & countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed Calendar View - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the Pendo experience of planning, summarizing and browsing

• Evolutionized To-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item now by tapping "return" from that item; introduced a gap between unchecked & checked items to clearly distinguish them ;)

• Repeating To-do's update mechanism becomes more robust, with enhancements on reminder accuracy & layout in timeline.

• Today Widget now shows the To-do with the closest set time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having long text with lots of pictures.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

4.0.1 improved long text with multiple photos, fixed repeating to-do not updating & some crashing problems.

4.0.2 fixed a storage bug with iPhone X that caused crashes when adding lots of photos at once, and improved photo storage stability.

4.0.3 fixed:
- Launching crash if updating from an old version of Pendo
- An issue that calendar events sometimes swap with normal notes
- Can’t add photo to a contact
- Can’t zoom photo on screen edge

4.0.3 also brought date range selection in calendar view, as well as improved event comprehension accuracy.

Enjoy the 4!!

4.0.3 fixed:
- Launching crash if updating from an old version of Pendo
- An issue that calendar events sometimes swap with normal notes
- Can’t add photo to a contact
- Can’t zoom photo on screen edge

4.0.3 also brought date range selection in calendar view, as well as improved event comprehension accuracy.

Enjoy the 4!!

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed Calendar View, evolutionized To-do interaction, beautifully enhanced Journal layout & countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed Calendar View - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the Pendo experience of planning, summarizing and browsing

• Evolutionized To-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item now by tapping "return" from that item; introduced a gap between unchecked & checked items to clearly distinguish them ;)

• Repeating To-do's update mechanism becomes more robust, with enhancements on reminder accuracy & layout in timeline.

• Today Widget now shows the To-do with the closest set time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having long text with lots of pictures.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

4.0.1 - 4.0.4 improved long text + multiple photos experience, brought date range selection in calendar view, improved event comprehension accuracy, and fixed:
- Launching crash if updating from an old version of Pendo
- iPhone X specific crash when adding multiple photos at once
- Repeating to-do not updating
- Calendar events sometimes swap with normal notes
- Can’t add photo to a contact
- Can’t zoom photo on screen edge
- April Fool birthday icon for ff’s bday, one of Pendo’s creators ;)
- Ability to load thumbnails for 15+ photos to make sure notes are openable even if iOS memory is limited

Enjoy the 4!!

Enjoy the 4!!

4.0.5 enhanced long text + photos interaction, separated iPad layout from iPhone, simplified timeline colors, fixed an issue that some repeating to-dos get wrong time, and included many subtle tweaks.

Pendo 4 brings imaginatively designed Calendar View, evolutionized To-do interaction, beautifully enhanced Journal layout & countless improvements:

• Imaginatively designed Calendar View - you can tell how many notes of each type there are for any day at a glance. This greatly perfected the Pendo experience of planning, summarizing and browsing

• Evolutionized To-do interaction - you can add a new to-do after any item now by tapping "return" from that item; introduced a gap between unchecked & checked items to clearly distinguish them ;)

• Repeating To-do's update mechanism becomes more robust, with enhancements on reminder accuracy & layout in timeline.

• Today Widget now shows the To-do with the closest set time, and you can navigate back and forth freely.

• You could choose language independent of system settings now.

• When searching, picking date or deleting, any other action would cancel the current state, making the usage flow more clear.

• Reduced launch time by 10% & note opening time by 60%, and improved timeline reloading smoothness.

• Enhanced interactions when having long text with lots of pictures.

• Fixed an issue when keep pulling for more calendar events, could only get older events.

Enjoy the 4!!

Only 0.0.1 version bump, but lots of underlying enhancements ;)
Pendo can sync with subscribed calendars now! 
Calendar reminder time now applies to all synced events once you change it. 
Improved Today Widget for both to-do and calendar events 
Repeating to-dos now update more accurately 
Smoother experience with long text & images 
Better support to reversed timeline 
Nicer iPad layout 
More visible tags in Timeline 
Faster app launch speed
Enjoy!

Pendo 5 is here! We are proud to bring you -
1. Markdown support, with special highlight marker & customized dividers
2. Journal is now more beautiful in layout, and have weather & location noted
3. When it's her/his birthday or your anniversary, you'll see a special event icon so you won't miss ;)
4. Starred to-do list which blinks & keeps on top of today's notes so you never forget
5. A normal to-do reminder sound, yes we know a "meow" doesn't fit some serious meeting rooms, well.
6. If a Calendar event's duration is more than an hour, it will be displayed directly on timeline
7. More themes!
8. Added VoiceOver to every item so that people with disabilities can also enjoy Pendo :)
9. Tons of stability enhancements & bug fixes

Happy New Year!!

Summer is here! This update scrutinized syncing & put more love to journals - bringing to you:
• Overhauled syncing system which is much more accurate & efficient!
• More accurate location & more reliable weather info for new journals
• Ability to update existing journals' locations - you can even write up your own fairy place :)
• Letter count for journals, to help you better feel your writing flow ;)
• Way better results when cut, paste, delete & undo with pictures
• Fixed Calendar accounts sometimes get overridden issue, and better support for multi-day events
• Enhanced layouts in calendar view & timeline
• Improved notes searching speed
• Lots of subtle enhancements for to-dos

Enjoy Summer Time!

Enjoy Summer Time!

Summer is here! This update fixed a layout issue for notes with pictures & a cursor jumping issue when deleting numbers.

5.2 is bringing to you:

• Overhauled syncing system which is much more accurate & efficient!
• More accurate location & more reliable weather info for new journals
• Ability to update existing journals' locations - you can even write up your own fairy place :)
• Letter count for journals, to help you better feel your writing flow ;)
• Way better results when cut, paste, delete & undo with pictures
• Fixed Calendar accounts sometimes get overridden issue, and better support for multi-day events
• Enhanced layouts in calendar view & timeline
• Improved notes searching speed
• Lots of subtle enhancements for to-dos

This update added option to change Timeline font size, made date display more clear, fixed repeating calendar events & events with tags, improved syncing mechanism, and removed swipe-right-to-return gesture when editing a note to reduce mistakes (swiping from the edge still works)

This update added option to change Timeline font size, made date display more clear, fixed repeating calendar events & events with tags, improved syncing mechanism, and removed swipe-right-to-return gesture when editing a note to reduce mistakes (swiping from the edge still works)

The cat now turns to black with iOS 13 Dark Mode, has learned to crop photos with claws, and can even find words in a note!
Besides, we created a new way to make today’s notes stand out in Timeline, brought back the popular swipe-right-to-return-to-Timeline gesture, and made enhancements in various areas for you to explore ;)

Besides, we created a new way to make today’s notes stand out in Timeline, brought back the popular swipe-right-to-return-to-Timeline gesture, and made enhancements in various areas for you to explore ;)

Nice day! This update brings:
- A bit more contrast in Dark Mode to make reading easier
- Cooba theme now supports Dark Mode for cyberpunk fans ;)
- Fixed repeating to-do notification time issue in certain scenarios
- Calendar View now support starting the week on Sunday

Happy Xmas! We enhanced interaction with photos, and brought a new photo picker!
Happy Xmas! We enhanced interaction with photos, and brought a new photo picker!
Happy Xmas! We enhanced interaction with photos, and brought a new photo picker!
Happy Xmas! We enhanced interaction with photos, and brought a new photo picker!

We brought back the Back button ;)

More seriously, this update brings:
1. Photo filters - let us know what you think and what filters you’d like to have!
2. Improved text & photo editing experience - .e.g tapping on the edge of a photo can now easily put the cursor there instead of viewing the photo
3. Memory ability - next time you open Pendo, your previous Calendar view, search term, tags and categories will be kept
4. Lots of other enhancements including better dark mode support, fixed Calendar account selection, camera flash off by default etc etc

Spring is coming

This update fixed a bunch of bugs:
• Taking too much memory when choosing photos
• Some albums might not show up
• If edited a photo but didn’t return to Timeline afterwards, the next time you open Pendo the original photo might show up again
• When selecting text in To-do, could mistakenly return to Timeline
• Sometimes a default Calendar account is not selected

3. Memory ability - next time you open Pendo, your previous Calendar view, search term, tags and categories will be kept
4. Lots of other enhancements including better dark mode support, fixed Calendar account selection, camera flash off by default etc etc
